resources.string: The preset will have sounds based on the keywords you choose, and the intense preset will play more sounds together.
A preset with that name already exists. Try a different one!
The preset name is missing. Please enter a unique one!
Awesome! Your preset has been saved.
Are you sure you want to delete "%1$s"? You cannot undo this action.
Your preset has been successfully deleted!
It looks like this preset is no longer available. It may have been deleted.
You can easily create your own presets by playing sounds and then saving them from the sound library. Just hit the Save button and give it a unique name.
Sorry, it looks like your home screen app doesn\'t support shortcuts.
Make your presets visible when you open the app by enabling this option. You\'ll need to restart the app for the changes to take effect.
Sleep timer cancelled! The app will stay active.
Noice will automatically turn off when the timer ends. Use the buttons below to set the timer and add more time.
Focus, meditate and relax with natural calming noise.
Easily share Noice\'s calming ambience on other Chromecast-enabled devices, such as speakers or TVs.
Explore all the features by swiping left!
Save your sound mix by clicking the save button in the bottom corner of the library. Find saved mixes in the \'Presets\' tab of the bottom bar.
Use the volume slider to adjust the volume of each sound. Some sounds will repeat seamlessly, while others will repeat with a random delay.
Fall asleep effortlessly with Noice\'s sleep timer, and wake up to a serene environment with its mindful alarms.
Support Noice\'s development and keep the app ad-free with a one-time donation. Your contribution will help us improve the app for you.
Your payment will be securely processed by Google Play. Please note that depending on your location, additional taxes _may be_ added to the final amount.
Your generous contribution to the Noice project is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve the app for you.

Your support doesn\'t have to stop at a donation. You can also help us by spreading the word about Noice to your friends. The more users we have, the more feedback we receive and the better we can make our service for everyone.

We\'d love to hear from you about the app. Please take a moment to visit our GitHub repository. If you didn\'t love the app, please consider opening up an issue explaining your concerns. Otherwise, please star the project to show love and support.
Preset has been removed from app shortcuts!
Preset has been added to app shortcuts!
Failed to add the preset to app shortcuts!
Time duration in seconds for fading-in sounds
Time duration in seconds for fading-out sounds
Failed to add the shortcut to the home screen!
Shortcut has been added to the home screen!
Pause Noice when other apps play audio
Continue playing Noice even when other apps play audio
Save a copy of your current presets to an external file
Importing saved presets from an external file will replace any existing presets
Are you sure you want to remove all preset shortcuts from the app shortcut menu? This action cannot be undone.
All app shortcuts have been removed!
Sorry, we were unable to write to the selected file!
Sorry, we couldn\'t read the selected file!
Invalid file format! Please check the import file.
Presets imported successfully, ready to be explored!

We want to make your experience with Noice as smooth as possible. To do that, we collect data on how you use the app and any errors that may occur. It helps us identify issues and improve the app. You can read more about this in our [privacy policy](https://trynoice.com/privacy-policy#android-app-performance-data). You can control your data-sharing preferences at any time in the app settings.
Help us improve Noice by sharing usage and behaviour data with the developers
Sorry, we couldn\'t load the in-app product details. Please try again later!
Sorry, there was an issue starting your purchase. Please try again later!
Your payment is being processed. We\'ll notify you once it\'s complete.
Use hardware media buttons to control playback
Please enter your email to sign-in.
Please enter your name and email to sign-up.
The name you\'ve entered is invalid!
The email you\'ve entered is invalid!
You\'ll be able to request sign-in links for this email again after %1$s.
We\'ve sent you a sign-in link at %1$s. Please check your inbox!
We\'ve sent you a sign-in link at %1$s if this email belongs to a registered account. Please check your inbox!
Complete the sign-in process by clicking the link sent to your email and opening it with Noice.
Uh-oh! It looks like you don\'t have an email app on your device.
Oops! The sign-in link seems to be invalid or expired. Please request a new one and try again.
Welcome aboard! You\'re now successfully signed in.
Are you sure you want to sign out? Don\'t worry, you can always come back!

Say farewell to your account with a graceful goodbye, knowing that your Noice Premium subscription will be cancelled and your data will be permanently erased from our servers in 7 days. But, if you change your mind, you can easily restore your account before the 7 days are up.
The entered email is already in use.
Your account details were updated successfully.
Uh-oh! Payment failed. Don\'t worry! Your refund is on the way. If you don\'t see it within a week, let us know.
Please log in or create an account to proceed.

Uh-oh! We hit a snag while confirming your payment. It could be a network glitch or a delay from the payment provider. Rest assured that we\'ll update your subscription status as soon as we hear back about the payment. Please check again later!
Congratulations! Your Noice Premium subscription is now live and ready to elevate your listening experience.
Are you sure you want to cancel your Noice Premium subscription? Your subscription will end at the end of your current billing period, which ends on %1$s.
Experience the full potential of Noice with a Premium subscription. Upgrade now and discover exclusive features that will elevate your listening experience.
Offers more sound clips with Noice Premium
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch your account details. %1$s
Oh no! We couldn\'t cancel your subscription. %1$s Please try again!
Oh no! We couldn\'t delete your account. %1$s Please try again!
Oh no! We couldn\'t update your details. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t start the payment process. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch the sound library. %1$s
Uh-oh! We couldn\'t email you a sign-in link. %1$s Please try again later!
Oh no! We couldn\'t sign you out. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch subscription plans. %1$s
Uh-oh! We couldn\'t fetch your subscription purchase history. %1$s
The maximum audio quality for streaming. Medium, High and Ultra will only work if you\'re subscribed to Noice Premium.
The preset URL appears to be invalid!
Oh no! We couldn\'t load sound keywords. %1$s Please try again!
Uh-oh! We failed to generate a preset. %1$s Please try again!
By continuing, you agree to our [Terms of Service](https://trynoice.com/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://trynoice.com/privacy-policy).
Sorry, the gift card code you entered is invalid!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch the gift card. %1$s
The gift card with the given code has already been redeemed.
The gift card with the given code has expired.
You are ready to unlock the full potential of Noice with this gift card! Redeeming it will offer you Noice Premium access until %1$s.
Oh no! We couldn\'t redeem your gift card. %1$s
Write a review on Google Play
Use the same color scheme as your device\'s settings
Oops! We couldn\'t open the billing portal. %1$s Please try again!
Progress notifications related to sound downloads.
Are you sure you want to delete all offline sounds?
All offline sounds are scheduled for removal. Sit back and relax, we\'ll take care of the rest.
Are you sure you want to delete the sound you downloaded for offline playback?
Adding %1$s to downloads for offline playback.
Adjusting volume for this sound? You\'ll need to give it a listen first!
Upgrade to Noice Premium to access this sound.
Add a new alarm by tapping the \"+\" button!
We need additional access to schedule alarms on your device. Please enable the **Alarms & reminders** permission for Noice in its app info page inside your device\'s system settings.
Please permit Noice to show notifications for alarms to be able to ring at their scheduled time.
Noice cannot ring alarms without the permission to show notifications!
Notifications shown when a scheduled alarm fires.
Notifications shown when preparing to fire a scheduled alarm.
We couldn\'t load the preset you selected for this alarm.
We had to disable some alarms as your Noice Premium subscription has expired!
Time duration in minutes for snoozing alarms
Time duration in minutes, after which to automatically silence the alarm reminder
Notifications shown on silencing scheduled alarms after the reminder duration has elapsed.
Duration in minutes for gradually increasing the volume when an alarm fires
This sound offers more sound clips with Noice Premium.
Unleash the full potential of your relaxation and focus experience with Noice Premium - with %1$s additional sounds.
Add a new dimension to your listening with additional sound clips to make each sound more unique and less monotonous.
Bring your soundscapes to life with real and natural sound variations generated on demand with our cutting-edge sound technology.
Experience noise like never before, with the ability to listen to sounds at up to 320 kbps MP3, rendering crystal-clear, high-fidelity audio.
Enjoy soothing sounds anytime, anywhere, with Noice\'s offline sound downloads - no internet connection is required.
Elevate your morning routine with Noice Premium - schedule an unlimited number of alarms for a personalised and peaceful start to your day.
